title: Prayer Timing
description: built a responsive project using React(Vite), MUI, Axios for API calls, Moment.js for arabic data/time , and useEffect for data handling

title: Age Calcolutor
description: Responsive React (Vite) app with dynamic validation, i18next language support, and Gregorian ↔ Hijri date conversion using Moment Hijri

title: Weather App
description: A React application built using Redux for state management, Localization for multi-language support, Moment.js for date formatting, and Material UI for a modern and fully responsive interface.

title: Todo List
description: A simple todo list application using React hooks and localStorage.

title: Posts-App
description: Social App – Responsive social platform with login, posts, comments, profiles, built with JS, Bootstrap, and Axios.

title: ThemeCraft
description: A customizable landing page with theme colors, dark/light mode, and saved user preferences using localStorage.

title: JumiaUI
description: A static Jumia clone using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, featuring responsive pages for Home, Product, Cart, and Login designed layout only no interactive functionality.

title: Template-Two
description: A front-end template built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It focuses on clean design, responsive layout. This project serves as a practice for implementing modern web layouts and styling techniques.

title: Template-Three
description: A front-end template built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It focuses on clean design, responsive layout. This project serves as a practice for implementing modern web layouts and styling techniques.

title: Dashboard
description: Responsive dashboard layout built with HTML and CSS , featuring modern design and cleav structure.

description: A front-end template built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It focuses on clean design, responsive layout. This project serves as a practice for implementing modern web layouts and styling techniques.
